extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Pulse Secure VPN
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Pulse Secure VPN to the corresponding patches for CVE-2019-11510.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is there evidence of CVE-2019-11510 exploitation after applying detection measures?

extracted_playbook.title: Change Active Directory Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Change passwords for all Active Directory accounts, including administrators and services accounts.

extracted_playbook.title: Look for Unauthorized Applications and Scheduled Tasks
extracted_playbook.description: Identify and remove unauthorized applications and scheduled tasks in the environment.

extracted_playbook.title: Remove Unauthorized Remote Access Programs
extracted_playbook.description: Remove any remote access programs not approved by the organization.

extracted_playbook.title: Remove Remote Access Trojans
extracted_playbook.description: Remove any remote access trojans from the environment.

extracted_playbook.title: Inspect Scheduled Tasks
extracted_playbook.description: Carefully inspect scheduled tasks for scripts or executables that may allow an attacker to connect to the environment.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is there evidence of malicious, suspicious, or anomalous activity or files?

extracted_playbook.title: Reimage and Redeploy Workstation or Server
extracted_playbook.description: Consider reimaging the workstation or server and redeploying back into the environment if malicious activity is found.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Infection Checks
extracted_playbook.description: Perform checks to ensure the infection is gone even if the workstation or host has been reimaged.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor for Future Exploitation
extracted_playbook.description: Continue monitoring the environment for any signs of CVE-2019-11510 exploitation.
